title: Alternative Holidays
description: Alternative Holidays is perhaps the best collection of suspenseful and sinister holiday stories and poems ever compiled under one cover. You will be transported from the bottom of the sea to Mount Olympus, from shopping malls in hell to a bathtub in a cheap motel.Cthulhu awakens.Cupid becomes a vigilante.Santa grants deadly wishes.And that is just the beginning of your journey into alternative visions of the holidays we know, love, and sometimes fear.So be prepared.
author: Alex Shvartsman
